0: The experience was lovely first time in Paris
The first experience was with Simon and he greeted us quite well
It was an amazing experience with supberb service
I experienced that in Paris you can bargain
Everything from the staff the food and the room contributed to an exceptional stay to which my spouse and I agreed was one of the best hotel experiences we have had
The experience in your hotel met my axpectations

Very impressed by the overall experience especially as I was lucky to receive an upgrade to an amazing Junior suite and enjoy as well the Thursday evening bar atmosphere with complimentary shoe shine massage and DJ which are appreciated when travelling alone on business
Overall good experience it is nice to have a refreshment at the welcome desk and some fruits
1: OK experience but not one we are likely to repeat
2: Coming back was a great experience
Experience was fine except for the refurbishment that was ongoing
Breakfast experience was average not great
So the check in experiences compared with other Pullman hotels was not so good
I am sure that this is to bad management and instructions to the reception and it affected overall our clients experience
The line was very bad we could not communicate with the front desk overall experience in check in time was really bad
It was okay experience nothing was done to make me feel like an Acor gold member
Second time of staying Hotel was very busy breakfast unfortunately was not has we had previously experienced
As a regular guest the staff does great effort to remember you by name which adds to the experience
We chose the Pullman as we always try to stay in the groups hotels but sadly this experience was far from the usual standard
